channel.title: sillygwailo tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from sillygwailo.

item.description: I have 5 30-day guest passes to @TheAthletic @TheAthleticTO to give away. DM me your email address and one of them is yours.
item.source:markdown: I have 5 30-day guest passes to @TheAthletic @TheAthleticTO to give away. DM me your email address and one of them is yours.

item.description:
@SFU @sfu_athletics It’s a perfectly cromulent name.

–Alumnus
item.source:markdown:
@SFU @sfu_athletics It’s a perfectly cromulent name.
–Alumnus

item.description: Will riders be given the option to pay the fare to avoid the fine? https://t.co/PSTkwiZVhC
item.source:markdown: Will riders be given the option to pay the fare to avoid the fine? https://t.co/PSTkwiZVhC

item.description: @bluegriff @domesticat It still feels fraught with peril. I have to test the timestamp sharing link each time before sharing, because who knows what changes with inline previews since the last time I shared it? And then there’s the end of the video where it references the beginning.
item.source:markdown: @bluegriff @domesticat It still feels fraught with peril. I have to test the timestamp sharing link each time before sharing, because who knows what changes with inline previews since the last time I shared it? And then there’s the end of the video where it references the beginning.

item.description: @domesticat I think about the parody of how both songs came to be a lot. (The first scene makes me reluctant to share it more widely.) https://t.co/MbBCjFJ1hZ
item.source:markdown: @domesticat I think about the parody of how both songs came to be a lot. (The first scene makes me reluctant to share it more widely.) https://t.co/MbBCjFJ1hZ

item.description: @PortmanDoe Beyoncé is still alive, so yes.
item.source:markdown: @PortmanDoe Beyoncé is still alive, so yes.

item.description: My handsome heroism last night at the Wu-Tang Clan concert was to zip up the backpack of a quite intoxicated woman. (I wonder how long she went with it open. It takes Torontonians a really long time to point something like that out.) I got a friendly pat on the shoulder for that.
item.source:markdown: My handsome heroism last night at the Wu-Tang Clan concert was to zip up the backpack of a quite intoxicated woman. (I wonder how long she went with it open. It takes Torontonians a really long time to point something like that out.) I got a friendly pat on the shoulder for that.

item.description: @Kimli I made a note about it for when it comes up in Timehop, because of how often I don’t remember what the hell I was talking about a year (or years) later, but otherwise, thank you so much for the compliment!
item.source:markdown: @Kimli I made a note about it for when it comes up in Timehop, because of how often I don’t remember what the hell I was talking about a year (or years) later, but otherwise, thank you so much for the compliment!

item.description: I know someone who I have certain opinions about, who went to a certain event recently, which I also have certain opinions about, with whom I don’t think a certain thing will happen, but I’ve been wrong before.
item.source:markdown: I know someone who I have certain opinions about, who went to a certain event recently, which I also have certain opinions about, with whom I don’t think a certain thing will happen, but I’ve been wrong before.

item.description: I wish I could split off to Enamel Pins Twitter. https://t.co/b4yjPGBH60
item.source:markdown: I wish I could split off to Enamel Pins Twitter. https://t.co/b4yjPGBH60

item.description: @JerryBeenAround Is he rolling through anywhere nearby with Redman? They’re coming to Toronto in November but I might skip them (I already saw them when they performed here a few years ago).
item.source:markdown: @JerryBeenAround Is he rolling through anywhere nearby with Redman? They’re coming to Toronto in November but I might skip them (I already saw them when they performed here a few years ago).

item.description: @BovyMaltz Is it legal to marry an article? For the record, I believe it should be, just like it should be legal to marry beer bottle labels. https://t.co/U3Hs5qFXc0
item.source:markdown: @BovyMaltz Is it legal to marry an article? For the record, I believe it should be, just like it should be legal to marry beer bottle labels. https://t.co/U3Hs5qFXc0

item.description: @DanFitzWrites I unfollowed mine, because they weren’t talking to me when I did interact with them, and it got to be too hard to be reminded of my fancies on a daily basis. I think it’s fine to have crushes, but I would never tell them (it was a mistake to reveal who one was to a third party). https://t.co/HfR0FgtNcr
item.source:markdown: @DanFitzWrites I unfollowed mine, because they weren’t talking to me when I did interact with them, and it got to be too hard to be reminded of my fancies on a daily basis. I think it’s fine to have crushes, but I would never tell them (it was a mistake to reveal who one was to a third party). https://t.co/HfR0FgtNcr

item.description:
It’s back! https://t.co/c38f0gedQq https://t.co/bdKbJCRK2X

The International Brotherhood of Boilermakers Local 128 are back with their DJ. https://t.co/msBQFtHsnl

It’s hard to imagine a Labour Day Parade trailer squeezing in more things that I love on it, but the Laborers' International Union of North America Labour Day Parade squeezed in a lot of them. https://t.co/iICaccw2C2

It wasn’t me wearing a hard hat and raising my left fist at the CN Tower, but it could’ve been me.

I walked along with the United Steelworkers float, in part because the DJ was playing reggae music, but also because it was the union my dad’s forest workers union merged with. https://t.co/7RsCPfBlTK

I always speed-run parades, and I don’t always stay till the end of them. For this year’s edition of the Toronto Labour Day Parade, I’ll never know if there was a rendition of “Union Strike Folk Song (Parts 1 & 2)” in the remaining floats. https://t.co/Bm82yaHE8w
item.source:markdown:
It’s back! https://t.co/c38f0gedQq https://t.co/bdKbJCRK2X
The International Brotherhood of Boilermakers Local 128 are back with their DJ. https://t.co/msBQFtHsnl
It’s hard to imagine a Labour Day Parade trailer squeezing in more things that I love on it, but the Laborers' International Union of North America Labour Day Parade squeezed in a lot of them. https://t.co/iICaccw2C2
It wasn’t me wearing a hard hat and raising my left fist at the CN Tower, but it could’ve been me.
I walked along with the United Steelworkers float, in part because the DJ was playing reggae music, but also because it was the union my dad’s forest workers union merged with. https://t.co/7RsCPfBlTK
I always speed-run parades, and I don’t always stay till the end of them. For this year’s edition of the Toronto Labour Day Parade, I’ll never know if there was a rendition of “Union Strike Folk Song (Parts 1 & 2)” in the remaining floats. https://t.co/Bm82yaHE8w

item.description: @rtanglao We have e-bikes in Toronto. I just have tried them yet. https://t.co/sXX73T34O7
item.source:markdown: @rtanglao We have e-bikes in Toronto. I just have tried them yet. https://t.co/sXX73T34O7

item.description:
Tonight. https://t.co/Rte220choI

No Method Man tonight. OK.

No Busta Rhymes either. They made a big deal about him joining the tour.

YDB, ODB’s son, is here rapping his father’s verses. That’s pretty cool.

Setlist for last night’s Wu-Tang Clan concert in Toronto at the Budweiser Stage: https://t.co/lG6IxQNenS

Setlist for last night’s Nas concert in Toronto at the Budweiser Stage: https://t.co/SMDz9spr0v
item.source:markdown:
Tonight. https://t.co/Rte220choI
No Method Man tonight. OK.
No Busta Rhymes either. They made a big deal about him joining the tour.
YDB, ODB’s son, is here rapping his father’s verses. That’s pretty cool.
Setlist for last night’s Wu-Tang Clan concert in Toronto at the Budweiser Stage: https://t.co/lG6IxQNenS
Setlist for last night’s Nas concert in Toronto at the Budweiser Stage: https://t.co/SMDz9spr0v

item.description: Covie is definitely ovie at the Canadian National Exhibition.
item.source:markdown: Covie is definitely ovie at the Canadian National Exhibition.

item.description: @DailyHiveTO The location at 370 King St. W. is open again! https://t.co/FyttluPYQI
item.source:markdown: @DailyHiveTO The location at 370 King St. W. is open again! https://t.co/FyttluPYQI

item.description:
Have you ever heard of a Starbucks closing permanently but then re-opening at the same location? That’s what happened at the 370 King St. W. location under the Hyatt Regency in Toronto. https://t.co/95jXOUzkTx

It was full of people, and I was the only one there wearing a mask, if you were wondering.
item.source:markdown:
Have you ever heard of a Starbucks closing permanently but then re-opening at the same location? That’s what happened at the 370 King St. W. location under the Hyatt Regency in Toronto. https://t.co/95jXOUzkTx
It was full of people, and I was the only one there wearing a mask, if you were wondering.

item.description: Extroverts in Toronto seem happy tonight.
item.source:markdown: Extroverts in Toronto seem happy tonight.

item.description: @rtanglao I haven’t done e-assist yet. I want to test it out first, i.e. not have somewhere I have to be, before choosing it at a bike share stall.
item.source:markdown: @rtanglao I haven’t done e-assist yet. I want to test it out first, i.e. not have somewhere I have to be, before choosing it at a bike share stall.

item.description: @rtanglao Coffee and donuts (I prefer the American spelling) at Lucky’s Doughnuts on Main and E. 13th. That’s still my favourite coffee shop of all time.
item.source:markdown: @rtanglao Coffee and donuts (I prefer the American spelling) at Lucky’s Doughnuts on Main and E. 13th. That’s still my favourite coffee shop of all time.
